thread.title: BBC Radio 4 - Any Questions?, Stephen Crabb MP, Nia Griffith MP, Sir Emyr Jones Parry, Leanne Wood AM
thread.title_full: BBC Radio 4 - Any Questions?, Stephen Crabb MP, Nia Griffith MP, Sir Emyr Jones Parry, Leanne Wood AM

title: BBC Radio 4 - Any Questions?, Stephen Crabb MP, Nia Griffith MP, Sir Emyr Jones Parry, Leanne Wood AM
text:
Listen in pop-out player 
Jonathan Dimbleby presents political debate from The Magic Lantern Cinema in Tywyn, Wales, with a panel including the former cabinet minister Stephen Crabb MP, Shadow Defence Secretary Nia Griffith MP, Sir Emyr Jones Parry who is Chancellor of University of Aberystwyth and a former diplomat and the leader of Plaid Cymru Leanne Wood AM. Show more / Show less
